trans-unit.source: Represents the license transform algorithm used to normalize XrML licenses for signatures.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class represents the license transform algorithm as defined in the MPEG Rights Extension Language (MPEG REL).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> Класс представляет алгоритм преобразования лицензий согласно языку расширения прав MPEG (MPEG REL).

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class to transform XrML licenses for signatures.
trans-unit.target: Используйте <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> класса для преобразования лицензий XrML для подписей.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlLicenseTransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: Универсальный код ресурса (URI), описывающий <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> определяется класс <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlLicenseTransformUrl> поля.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to validate an XML digital signature using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода показано, как проверить цифровую подпись XML с помощью <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> интерфейс и <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> класса.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> class.
Gets or sets the decryptor of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.
The decryptor of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> object uses an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface to decrypt `<encryptedGrant>` elements from the current `<license>` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> Объектов используют <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> интерфейс для расшифровки `<encryptedGrant>` элементов из текущего `<license>` элемента.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to validate an XML digital signature using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> interface and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода показано, как проверить цифровую подпись XML с помощью <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.IRelDecryptor> интерфейс и <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> класса.

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.

A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object in an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
Returns the output of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.
Returns the output of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.
The output of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.
The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.
The type of the output to return.
<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> is the only valid type for this parameter.
Returns the output of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.
The output of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.
The <paramref name="type" /> parameter is not an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.

Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform.OutputTypes" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.

An array of types that are valid inputs to the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform.OutputTypes" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform.OutputTypes" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Массив типов, которые являются допустимыми входными данными для <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform.OutputTypes" /> метод текущего <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> объекту можно передать только объекты одного из этих типов для <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform.OutputTypes" /> метод текущего <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> объекта.

trans-unit.source: The only valid input type to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class is <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Единственный допустимый тип входных данных для <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> класс <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object that encapsulates the transform to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.

Parses the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object as transform-specific content of a <see langword="<Transform>" /> element; this method is not supported because the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object has no inner XML elements.
The input to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.
The type of the input object must be <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />.
Loads the specified input into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.
The context was not set before this transform was invoked.
-or-
The <see langword="<issuer>" /> element was not set before this transform was invoked.
-or-
The <see langword="<license>" /> element was not set before this transform was invoked.
-or-
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform.Decryptor" /> property was not set before this transform was invoked.

Gets an array of types that are valid outputs from the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform.OutputTypes" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.

An array of valid output types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Массив допустимых типов выходных данных для текущего <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> объект; только объекты одного из этих типов возвращаются из <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform.GetOutput" /> методы текущего <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform" /> объекта.

trans-unit.source: The only valid output type to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class is <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Тип выходных данных допустимы только для <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> класс <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.
